item.title: Hugo Travelify Theme Features
item.description: Hugo-Travelify-Theme is the Hugo version of the Wordpress theme - Travelify . The source code was adapted from digitalcraftsman’s Icarus theme with a few changes for additional features (Even this README is a fork from his original theme README :)).
